# QLThumbnailMinimumSize

**Property List Key**

The minimum size, in points, along one dimension of thumbnails for a Quick Look app’s generator.

## Discussion

If you set this key, Quick Look uses the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/QuickLook/QLGeneratorInterfaceStruct/GenerateThumbnailForURL] property for thumbnail sizes greater than this value. If your app’s generator is fast, you can omit this key so that the thumbnail appears in standard lists.

## QuickLook

- **QLNeedsToBeRunInMainThread**: A Boolean value indicating whether a Quick Look app’s generator can be run in threads other than the main thread.
- **QLPreviewHeight**: A hint at the height, in points, of a Quick Look app’s previews.
- **QLPreviewWidth**: A hint at the width, in points, of a Quick Look app’s previews.
- **QLSupportsConcurrentRequests**: A Boolean value indicating whether a Quick Look app’s  generator can handle concurrent thumbnail and preview requests.
